title: Leaver buster
body:
I have had times where my wifi has crashed, I reconnected won with the team and still got hit with penalties... There have been times I have been disconnected by "the game, " itself. Like today 6/14/2017 I crashed out of my game and couldn't connect cause of the current issue I'm just tired of the 20 minute bans i've had so many times now. Wondering if there is anything that can be done to compensate the lost Lp for me and my teams. 
That being said you should have something where if its a crash the team can report it and not receive a "loss."

replies.body:
We're investigating the offline errors now in our pinned thread, but it seems to happen if you try to relog while in a game.  This workaround should help per our [pinned thread](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/Tb1fUZFV-known-issue-were-unable-to-log-you-in-because-you-may-be-offline):

Go to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Open "LeagueClientSettings.yaml" with notepad
Find the line:

gameflow-patcher-lock:

Delete this whole line
Save the file, restart your LoL Client - and you should be able to log in again.

I can't restore LP, but we can look into the leaverbuster.  No guarantees, but reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll see if we can work something out!
